text:
1/2

Gucci Mane (L) and Keyshia Ka'oir tied the knot Tuesday at the Four Seasons in Miami, Fla. File Photo by Jim Ruymen/UPI | License Photo

Oct. 18 (UPI) -- Gucci Mane married fiancée Keyshia Ka'oir at a lavish wedding Tuesday in Miami. The 37-year-old rapper, born Radric Davis, tied the knot with Ka'oir at a $1.7 million ceremony at the Four Seasons, according to People. Advertisement

Sean "Diddy" Combs, Karrueche Tran, Big Sean and Kim Zolciak were among the celebrity guests. Diddy offered his congratulations to Gucci Mane and Ka'oir in an Instagram post Tuesday night.

"Congrats to @laflare1017 @keyshiakaoir!! God bless your unity, your family, your friends and your whole world!! May it be positive and elevated at the highest form of positivity and elevation!!" the rapper wrote.

"It was an honor to be there!" he added. "Thank you for inviting me and my family!! Love!! Love!! Love!!"

Gucci Mane and Ka'oir also shared photos from their nuptials on their respective accounts. The couple stunned in all-white ensembles, with the rapper in a tuxedo and Ka'oir in a sparkling embellished gown.

"Mr and Mrs Davis 10/17/17 we married," Gucci Mane captioned a picture with his bride.

Mr and Mrs Davis 10/17/17 we married Advertisement A post shared by Gucci Mane (@laflare1017) on Oct 17, 2017 at 8:33pm PDT

"Me & my husbandddddddddddddd," Ka'oir added to another snapshot.

Me & my husbandddddddddddddd💍 A post shared by Keyshia Ka'oir Davis (@keyshiakaoir) on Oct 17, 2017 at 9:48pm PDT

Gucci Mane and Ka'oir filmed their wedding for the BET special Gucci Mane and Keyshia Ka'oir: The Mane Event, which premiered Tuesday. The 10-part series follows the planning and events leading up to the couple's nuptials.
title: Gucci Mane marries Keyshia Ka'oir at lavish wedding in Miami

meta_data.description: Gucci Mane tied the knot with Keyshia Ka'oir at a reported $1.7 million ceremony at the Four Seasons.
